What is optimization and why is it necessary?

There are countless active and even abandoned sites on the Internet. Most of them coincide not only in terms of categories, but also in terms of content.

Imagine thousands of sites on which in one way or another the same information is provided or the same service is sold. And you can get to these sites only by thematic requests in search engines.

But what if your site looks like a hundred or a thousand of the same ones, but there are only 10 positions on one page of Google or Yandex? How to bring visitors to your resource page? That's what optimization is for - to bring your site to the first search page!

We will teach you how to make your site attractive to search engines and advise you how to get it to the first pages, bypassing all competitors.
